me.donkeycore.dpl.io

Class DonkeyClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.dpl.io.DonkeyClass

  • public final class DonkeyClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages basic attributes of the class file and creates an IOClass for the file
    Since:
    1.0

      • runCode

        public void runCode()
             throws InvalidFileException,
                    TypeDoesNotExistException,
                    IncompatibleVariableTypesException,
                    VariableAlreadyDeclaredException
        Run the code inside the file.
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - If the file does not end with .donkey or is not a valid Donkey class file
        IncompatibleVariableTypesException - If a variable is assigned something that it cannot represent
        TypeDoesNotExistException - If a variable being assigned has not been declared
        VariableAlreadyDeclaredException - If a variable has already been declared
        Since:
        1.0
